headline: Piper Sandler Sees Strong Momentum in Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) Stock
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) ranks among the most undervalued NASDAQ stocks to buy now. On September 17, Piper Sandler maintained its Overweight rating on Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) but reduced its price target from $40 to $35. Following the acquisition of JDEP, Piper Sandler expressed worries regarding KDP’s post-acquisition leverage, which the firm […]
